resources.string: Join the Sail to the Diving and enjoy a dream vacation. With a specialized staff in both areas we can guarantee the best of both worlds. During your adventure on board our boat, make up to two dives per day and get to know the best spots in the Azores.

Scuba Diving is our main activity.From Baixa dos Rosais to Ilhéu do Topo, we have a wide range of unforgettable spots. We organize Diving Trips for different levels of experience. If you would like to have a first experience of diving, we have for you baptisms of pool and sea.

If you like to observe underwater beauty but do not like depth, this is the solution for you. We encourage snorkeling trips for all levels and ages, where you can observe underwater rock formations and live with the surrounding marine life.
Accompanied by an experienced Skipper, you can free yourself from all the worries and enjoy, with family or friends, the most beautiful landscapes that the Azores have to offer.

With us you can enjoy a pleasant sail tour along the coast of São Jorge island, you can visit its fajãs, take a break to swim or even observe the marine life that surrounds us. During your tour you can also participate in the navigation and learn a little more about the activity.

To know the hidden secrets of our coast we suggest a Stand Up Paddle or Kayak tour. You can choose to take a guided tour, where we will introduce you to the most special sites, or you can rent and break the discovery.
With us you can enjoy a pleasant tour along the coast of São Jorge, you can visit its “Fajãs”, take a break to swim or even observe the marine life that surrounds us.
